text: Kim Kardashian and Tristan Thompson have unfollowed each other on social media, amid claims the sportsman cheated on the reality star ’ s sister Khloe. The disgraced basketball player was caught on camera kissing an unidentified woman in a nightclub just days before his girlfriend gave birth to their daughter True last month, while video of another woman joining him at his home last year, when Khloe was three months pregnant, also surfaced. Just hours after Kim addressed Tristan ’ s behaviour during an interview on The Ellen DeGeneres Show which aired on Monday, she made the decision to publicly unfollow him on Instagram – with him then returning the favour.
